long_description: The Super B Deluxe tool kit has 20 essential tools for the home mechanic. They come packed inside a durable plastic tool box. Tools include cassette remover with pin tool (Shimano type). 15mm pedal wrench. Allen wrenches (1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 8mm). Crank remover. Chain rivet extractor (UB/HG compatible). Cog removal chain. Cable puller. Torx tool (size 25). Spoke wrenches (black and red). Cable cutter. Bottom bracket tool. External bottom bracket tool. Chain wear indicator. Cone wrenches (13, 15, and 17mm). Rotor tuning fork. Chain cleaner. Freewheel brush. Tool box dimensions: 17 x 7.5 x 7 in.
short_description: The Super B Deluxe tool kit has 20 essential tools for the home mechanic. They come packed inside a durable plastic tool box.
